summary: lord of the rings Uruk-Hai shield made in cinema 4d r13
descriptionHtml:
I have taken some time to model the shield that the Uruk-Hai use in the lord of the rings movies in cinema 4d r13 and thought that one of you nice people could finish the rest of the work (textures and importing to skyrim ) being a lord of the rings fan boy it was pretty easy to model and is almost the same as what you have seen in the movie or pictures ( except for the handle witch i could not see what it looks like i just improvised. if you use this please credit me - FatCat101
made in cinema 4d r13.
this download includes no textures.
i dont know about copyright but..... 
i do not own or claim the original creation of the lord of the rings or the name uraki..... just dont sue me....
author: FatCat101
